name: osu-multiplayer-plus
description: Discord bot adding virtual game-modes like Battle Royale to osu! multiplayer lobbies
author: github.com/ceilingwaffle

scripts.start:windows: rmdir /S /Q dist & tsc & xcopy .\src\locales .\dist\locales\ /E /C /Q /Y & ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.start:macos: rm -rf dist & tsc & cp -RfX src/locales/ dist/locales/ & ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.start:linux: rm -rf dist & tsc & mkdir -p dist/locales/ & cp -ar src/locales/ dist/locales/ & ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.start-js: rmdir /S /Q dist & tsc & xcopy .\src\locales .\dist\locales\ /E /C /Q /Y & node dist/index.js
scripts.delsqlite: rmdir /S /Q dist & tsc & del .\src\database\app-database.sqlite & npm run seed & npm start
scripts.test: rmdir /S /Q dist & tsc & xcopy .\src\locales .\dist\locales\ /E /C /Q /Y & mocha --require ts-node/register --require test/config/mocha.env.js test/**/*.test.ts --timeout 60000 --slow 1000
